description: This Java source file defines the 'Context' class, which encapsulates information about the current operation or environment, including configuration parameters like port numbers, service name, debug flag, paths, output directory, and a generation tracker.

classes.name: Context
classes.description: Represents the context for an operation, containing configuration details such as debug mode, port numbers, service name, paths, output directory, and a tracker.

methods.name: Context
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the genTracker object.

methods.name: isDebug
methods.description: Returns whether debug mode is enabled.

methods.name: getPaths
methods.description: Gets the PathValues object representing various paths.
